mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BOARD (BOARDID, BOARDTITLE, USERID, BOARDMAIN, BOARDNOTICE) VALUES (S_BOARD.NEXTVAL, #{boardTitle}, #{userId}, #{boardMain}, #{boardNotice})
mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARDID, BOARDTITLE, B.USERID, BOARDMAIN, BOARDNOTICE, BOARDVIEWS, BOARDREGISTERDATE, BOARDUPDATEDATE, J.RECOMMENDS FROM T_BOARD B JOIN (SELECT O.BOARDID, COUNT(R.BOARDID) AS RECOMMENDS FROM T_RECOMMEND R RIGHT JOIN T_BOARD O ON R.BOARDID = O.BOARDID GROUP BY O.BOARDID) J ON B.BOARDID = J.BOARDID WHERE BOARDNOTICE = #{boardNotice} ORDER BY J.BOARDID DESC

SELECT B.BOARDID, BOARDTITLE, B.USERID, BOARDMAIN, BOARDNOTICE, BOARDVIEWS, BOARDREGISTERDATE, BOARDUPDATEDATE, J.RECOMMENDS FROM T_BOARD B JOIN (SELECT O.BOARDID, COUNT(R.BOARDID) AS RECOMMENDS FROM T_RECOMMEND R RIGHT JOIN T_BOARD O ON R.BOARDID = O.BOARDID GROUP BY O.BOARDID) J ON B.BOARDID = J.BOARDID WHERE BOARDTITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY J.BOARDID DESC
